text: Savalas is a surname of Greek origin that may refer to: *Ariana Savalas (born 1987), American musician, daughter of Telly Savalas *George Savalas (1924-1985), American actor, brother of Telly Savalas *Telly Savalas (1922-1994), American actor == See also == *Zavala (disambiguation) Category:Greek-language surnames Category:Surnames
title: Savalas
